replies.body:
~~ヽʕ •ᴥ•ʔﾉ Raise your koalas ヽʕ •ᴥ•ʔﾉ~~
My koalas have been lowered
Typically weaksauce effort. OCE is never going to make it to worlds because we're just not good enough.

Well not with that spirit.
Need to be more positive and support your Region's TEAMS and we will be the best one day.

and yes Sky Williams I know League is not an anime but one day OCE will make it to the world championships.
y doesnt riot just let the best from every region goto the major? in counterstrike the 2 best teams from every region goto worlds, so why cant riot allow this?
please don't try in any way to make League like CS:GO tournaments. It's fine the way it is and if there is a **REAL** problem, then Riot will address it.

I agree, Riot has already released a statement that worlds is big enough to turn into a Olympic style event............. its just our region didn't have enough players to commit to it yet, however once the playing numbers go up instead of having a regional based team it will be per country, so even a team like afghanistan can compete...............
In that 2nd game I think we snatched defeat from the jaws of victory (54;13), anyway, lets work on shot calling and do better next time OCE.

,,, ʕ •ᴥ•ʔ ,,, Lower your dropbears ,,, ʕ •ᴥ•ʔ ,,,   

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=43-WlKMT0X0

0:05  says it all
Like I said to my mate; They're good enough for Oceania but not good enough for the world
